attributes.action: Build monument in Whitehall & create National day honoring NHS staff and victims
attributes.additional_details: It seems befitting that the UK as a whole should honor the greatest effort made by our front line health workers since the Second World War.
attributes.background: Parliament to discuss and regonise the unprecedented sacrifice made by NHS staff and recognise their utmost professionalism and dedication which cost so many NHS workers lives, caring for the many victims of this virus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308614
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317399

With regard to your request for a monument, the commissioning and building of monuments on Whitehall is a matter for Westminster City Council. We cannot accept petitions calling for actions which are not within the responsibilities of the Government or Parliament.
